botinfo.embed_description:
Hi my name is **{{name}}**, and I'm a Brazilian Bot for Discord with a focus on fun and RPG! I was created in **{{createdAt}}** and joined this server in **{{joinedAt}}**. Since I woke up, I've already executed **{{cmds}}** commands

A little bit about me: My name is Menhera, I am 16 years old and I LOVE, I mean, I LOOOOVE to use these faces: (>...<). To learn more, go to my [twitter](https://twitter.com/__MenheraBot), my [support server](https://discord.gg/fZMdQbA) and my [WEBSITE](https://menhera-site.vercel.app)
